original_text: When King Baasha heard this news, he stopped the work in Ramah. He left there and he went to live in Tirzah.
korean_text: 바아사가 듣고 라마를 건축하는 일을 중단하고 디르사에 거주하니라

sentences.original_text: When King Baasha heard this news
sentences.korean_translation: 바아사 왕이 이 소식을 들었을 때

sentences.original_text: he stopped the work in Ramah
